藒字的基本解释

藒
qì
〔藒车〕古书上说的一种香草，用以驱虫。

藒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《廣韻》丘謁切，入薛，溪。］
见“藒車”。

藒字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　藒； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1064第29
【唐韻】【集韻】?丘竭切，音朅。【爾雅·釋草】藒車，芞輿。【屈原·離騷】畦留夷與藒車。【本草】藒車香生徐州。○按《說文》作藒，《正字通》作䔾，韻書經典?作藒。《正字通》存䔾去藒，未知何據。

藒字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
藒字的起名意思

古书上说的一种香草。

Lei
Basic explanation of words
Lei
qì
[Louche] A kind of vanilla mentioned in ancient books, used to repel insects.
Lei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Guangyun" Qiu Ye cuts into Xue and Xi. ]
See "Louche".
Lei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Words] 　藒; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1064 Page 29
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qiu exhausted and cut the sound. 【Erya·Shucao】Lou Che, Xiang Yu. [Qu Yuan·Lisao] Qiliuyi and Leiche. 【Materia Medica】Louchexiang was born in Xuzhou. ○According to "Shuowen" as Lei, "Zhengzitong" as Lei, and Rhyme Book Classic? as Lei. "Zhengzitong" keeps you away, and you don't know the basis for it.
